channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: There is all sorts of rubbish all along the allyway which is blocking my walk way, 10th February
item.description:
These rubbish has been here waiting to be cleared for months it is blocking my walk way please can cameras be put up and the ally way cleared. There is also greens and grass that needs to be cut and cleaned as well as the flytipping

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Grenada Road, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Blocked drain

item.title: Graffiti on wall of church, 10th February
item.description:
Red pen graffiti on white wall at the edge of Christ Central Church, to the right as you look at the building.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Penge, Greater London

item.title: Improper disposal of waste, 10th February
item.description:
Improper disposal of household waste means waste collection won’t pick it up. Unsightly and attracting pests.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mortimer Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Dog litter bin overflowing, 10th February
item.description:
Dog poo bags atop and beneath the provided bin.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Spring Vale, Barnehurst, Greater London

item.title: Wait button doesn’t seem to work, 10th February
item.description:
Most of the buttons around this crossing don’t seem to do anything, the waiting lights don’t turn on. One of the buttons in the middle of the crossing does turn on for a brief moment before turning itself off again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 145, Hackney Road, Bethnal Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missed collections, 10th February
item.description:
The waste and recycling from our building has not been collected for some time - please see images attached - all overflowing. This is an ongoing issue, despite it being raised many times.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Maple Path, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pizza boxes etc dumped, 10th February
item.description:
As title, here this morning so dumped overnight. Hylton street, Marmadon road junction.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hylton Street, Plumstead

item.title: Fly tipping on street, 10th February
item.description:
Fly tipping on street by businesses and residents on Lower Clapton road that have access to Poerscroft road via alley. This is virtually a daily occurance and needs resolving in a meaningful way.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lower Clapton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress dumped, 10th February
item.description:
It’s been dumped next to the skip. Don’t think it belongs to skip owner as it’s been like this for a few days now. I expect skip owner would have put it in the skip. By brookedene hylton road junction.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brookdene Road, Plumstead

item.title: Large Pothole on Canterbury Grove after Junction with Thurlestone Road, 10th February
item.description:

item.title: Street light not working, 10th February
item.description:
Previously reported by several neighbours over the last two years, this street light is on a footpath and without it working the walkway is very dark and personal safety concern which is attracting crime
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Davern Close, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet
